* Ett starkt nätverk och kontakt med investerare, inkubatorer och kunder
* En tydlig vision och varumärkesplattform



  





 Vill du vara med och bygga nästa generations tjänsteplattform där AI blir tillgängligt för fler? Kontakta mig gärna för ett första samtal.
 



  





 📩 Mejla till info@genassista.com eller skicka ett meddelande på LinkedIn.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:
Job description:
   

  


**Driven by our vision of 'Progress for Humanity' – at Hyundai we work relentlessly to make high-quality, environmentally-friendly mobility available for all. The industry is re-inventing itself and we plan to lead this change with zero-emission vehicles, electrified powertrains, hydrogen fuel cell technology, and smart cities.** 




**At Hyundai, we don't just build cars – we are a leader in future mobility. At Hyundai, you get the opportunity to work in an international, dynamic, and challenging environment, where you will be encouraged to push boundaries and challenge conventions. We believe that the future of our organization lies in the passion and capabilities of individual members, and we support and encourage the development of their full potential.** 




  
 



**About the job:** 




 You will lead the full scope of digital marketing nationally – covering both strategic direction and hands-on execution. You are responsible for creating and executing digital marketing and media plans that drive traffic, leads, and strong brand perception, while delivering the best possible customer experience. With a strong digital and data-driven mindset, you will continuously optimize the performance of our campaigns across all digital touchpoints, with clear ownership of digital KPIs and budget. 
 



**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Own and execute digital marketing and media plans that support brand perception and drive performance across key KPIs, such as traffic, leads, and customer journey engagement.
* Have responsibility for the digital media budget, in close alignment with the Marketing Manager and Head of marketing and ensure effective media planning and optimization for ROI and ROAS.
* Drive execution of the national commercial and campaign plan from a digital perspective – ensuring digital activities are delivered on time, within budget, and with impact.
* Create briefs and lead collaboration with internal stakeholders and vendors across all digital channels (paid, owned, earned).
* Monitor, analyze, and report on digital campaign performance using tools like Google Analytics, Meta Ads Manager, and platform dashboards. Drive data-driven optimization and A/B testing. Together with vendors if needed.
* Plan and execute paid campaigns on Meta, YouTube, Google Ads, and programmatic platforms. Coordinate with CRM Specialist, Marketing Manager and vendors where needed.
* Ensure a seamless customer journey through smart use of digital touchpoints, UX, segmentation, and personalization – with a constant focus on improving conversion and engagement.
  

  


 Profile description:
   

  

**Required education, experience, and skills:** 
* Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a digital marketing role with both strategic and hands-on responsibilities.
* Proven experience in digital media buying (Meta, YouTube, Google Ads) and performance marketing with a track record of strong ROAS.
* Experience with tools such as Google Analytics (GA4), Meta Ads Manager, YouTube Studio, and A/B testing platforms.
* Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in marketing, digital communication, or a related field.
* Familiarity with programmatic advertising, marketing automation, and personalization strategies is a plus.
* Experience in handling AEM and Content management is an advantage.
* Excellent communication skills in Swedish and English.



**Desired** 
**Competencies:** 



* Strategic thinking and strong planning ability in a dynamic environment.
* Strong analytical skills and confidence using data to drive decisions.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, both internally and with external partners.
* Curious and proactive – always looking for new opportunities to grow our digital maturity and customer value.
* Results-oriented with high attention to detail and a problem-solving mindset.



 Become part of a global company with a history of success and ambitious plans for the future. Please apply by creating your candidate profile and attaching your application documents
 **in English.**

title: Industrial Design Lead
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
Born autonomous. Born electric.
   

  

 Since 2016, our technology has connected global communities with the things they need – and all without the emissions. We’re made up of experts in multiple fields and that’s how we’ve developed a new way to move goods. This is technology purpose-built for the industry. This is safer, cleaner, and more reliable movement.
   

  

 We are Einride and this is how we build a better future.
   

  

 Want to be part of transforming road freight – for good? Einride is showing the world a new way to move, based on the latest digital, electric and autonomous technologies. Through freight capacity as a service, we enable businesses around the world to accelerate towards their sustainability goals.
   

  

 Founded in 2016, Einride became the first company in the world to deploy a cab-less autonomous electric vehicle on a public road (Sweden, 2019). In 2022, we were the first to successfully operate such a vehicle on a US public road. Today our award-winning technology has been launched across 8 countries (and counting). Our clients are some of the world’s biggest shippers, including Fortune 500 companies. We are also operating Sweden’s largest truck dedicated public charging network and counting.
   

  

 As an Industrial Design Lead your role will be twofold. One part will be hands-on in the work we do but also to lead an interdisciplinary team with the ability to work on a multitude of products within the Einride ecosystem. Your responsibilities will include being a substantial part of the product development process all the way from the first user insights and ideas to implementation and scaling for mass production.
   

  

 The second responsibility lies within a newly formed initiative - As of 2025 Einride design team is now also offering our design services to a selected few external clients. Einride plan to build the best design team within technology and innovation - Offering services within Visual design, Marketing, Product design & Industrial design.
   

  

 We will lead with making great work and that will attract the right people and clients that are onboard with the type of work we want to put into the world.
   

  

 As Lead in any part of our offering, you will be the most senior person in that role. You will steer the creative vision, while forging strong relationships with external clients or stakeholders at Einride and overseeing complex, multi-functional projects across various domains. Your entrepreneurial mindset and problem-solving approach will thrive in these environments, and you need to be hands-on and also make sure that the people in your team have the best setup for doing a great job - That means you will need to be the person with the answers.
   

  

 You will
   

  

* Lead the industrial design team
* Engage with external clients and sell, package and present your part of the offering. Understand their business challenges and guide them toward effective creative solutions.
* Develop presentations that make lasting impressions all the way from strategy to the actual output.
* Lead new business pitches for your area and align with the other leads on how you sell the project.
* Take responsibility from idea to final launch and how we package a case for the next clients we want to work with.
* Determine the objectives and constraints of the design brief by consulting with relevant teams and stakeholders.
* Undertake product research and analyze functional, commercial, aesthetic requirements.
* Formulate design concepts for products within the Einride product Ecosystem - Automotive / Industrial / Consumer Products.
* Prepare sketches, CAD models, diagrams, illustrations, plans, samples, customer journey maps and models to communicate design concepts.
* Negotiate design solutions with relevant teams and stakeholders.
* Select, specify and recommend functional and aesthetic materials, production methods and finishes for manufacturing.
* Prepare and commission prototypes and samples.
* Supervise the preparation CAD Files, Patterns, programmes, tooling, and the manufacture/prototyping process.
* Ensure high design quality in what we deliver to our users, in close collaboration with our product and tech teamTake the lead on design for the projects you are involved in and work with different stakeholders to improve it.
* Visualize the Einride vision for the future.


**We Expect You To**
* Long solid experience in designing high-quality hardware products.
* Comfortable working with software such as: NURBS CAD tools like Rhino, Autodesk Alias, Polygon modelling tool like Blender or similar. Rendering tools like Keyshot, V-Ray, VRED, Maxwell render or similar. And Adobe Creative Cloud Package.
* Fantastic design skills and sense of form that should be showcased in your portfolio.
* You master the art of digital sketching and visualization
* A good understanding of manufacturing techniques and collaboration with engineers.
* Thrives in a fast-paced environment where you continuously get to develop meaningful ideas and deliver real impact to our users.
* Experience from a design agency/studio.


**A Bonus If**
* You have experience from the automotive industry.
* You have an understanding and interest in A-Class surfacing
* You have an understanding in mechanical design
* You have an interest in digital products, interface design, graphic design, UX Design


 This position is based in Stockholm. We recommend you submit your application as soon as possible as selection and interviews are held continually. Please note thata design portfolio is an essential part of your application, and a requirement to be considered for this role.
   

  

 At Einride, we are innovators, building solutions the world has never seen before - but urgently needs. That's why we take action, and it's why we are always eager to be challenged. We know that our best innovations come from having a diverse mix of people, including those of different experiences, career paths, and walks of life. By coming together and sharing our perspectives openly - by disagreeing, discussing, and committing - we deliver greater impact.

title: Senior UX Researcher
description:
**Description**
*Position at LeoVegas Group*
**About The Role**
 We’re looking for a Senior UX Researcher to join our Product Discovery Design team, where you’ll play a vital role in shaping product direction through deep user insight. Working alongside product managers, designers, data analysts, and the Research & Insights team, you’ll lead exploratory and evaluative research that uncovers user needs and behaviors across the entire journey.
   

  

 You’ll contribute to ongoing and upcoming roadmap initiatives by running usability tests, conducting concept validation, and identifying feature opportunities. Your work will directly influence design concepts, product strategy, and business decisions through continuous collaboration and storytelling. This is an exciting opportunity for someone passionate about embedding research into fast-paced product development while building meaningful experiences for real users.
   

  

 YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:
   

  

* Plan and execute user research to uncover user needs, behaviors, and opportunities across the product journey
* Conduct usability tests, concept validations, and desirability studies during pre-development phases
* Translate insights into clear, actionable direction for product and design teams through continuous storytelling and collaboration
* Collaborate closely with designers, product managers, and the Research & Insights team to align on goals and testing approaches
* Apply formative and generative research methods such as card sorting, tree testing, and remote usability testing
* Support product roadmap development by identifying and validating new features, navigation flows, and user experience improvements
* Track and communicate the impact of research on product decisions and business outcomes


 OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE THE FOLLOWING:
   

  

**Essential Skills**
* 5+ years of experience in UX research, with strong expertise in qualitative exploratory and evaluative methods
* Proven ability to plan, conduct, and communicate user research across different stages of the product lifecycle
* Strong storytelling and communication skills to share insights in a compelling, actionable way
* Experience collaborating with cross-functional teams including design, product, and engineering


 Nice to Have
   

  

* Experience with remote testing tools and methods such as card sorting and tree testing
* Background working in fast-paced, international, or highly collaborative environments


**Who We Are**
 At the core of LeoVegas Group is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry. We’re a team of over 1800 innovators, initiators, and groundbreakers working in a fast-paced and agile environment across 16 offices worldwide.
   

  

**Benefits**
* Hybrid work policy
* 4 weeks of Workation (T&C apply)
* 30 annual vacation days
* Occupational Pension
* 5,000 SEK wellness contribution annually
* Parental Leave Top-Up
* Possibility to enroll in a private health care insurance for both you and your partner
* 1,500 SEK equipment allowance
* Benify - benefits portal with many offers and discounts
* We offer a relocation package with accommodation and flights.


 In our pride, we empower our teammates to find their roar and run with their wildest ideas. We don’t wait for things to happen; we pounce and make it happen!
   

  

 Would you be a good fit for the Leo Pride - give us a roar!
   

  

 \*\*As our company working language is English, we’d like to see your CV in English, please\*\*

title: SEO Product Manager
job_function: Information Technology, Marketing, and General Business
description:
**Join us at Raketech, the powerhouse in iGaming affiliate and performance marketing🚀** 




**We seek a passionate, quick-thinking Product Manager to drive our vision forward. With our finger on the pulse of the industry, we’re propelling growth and innovation. Ready to make your mark in the dynamic world of iGaming? Let’s shape the future together at Raketech!** 




  





**The Role:** 




 We seek an
 **SEO Product Manager** 
 to join our crew and work on our essential products, with a focus on our casino vertical and contributing to the business’ growth. You must have strong ownership and a results-driven mindset.
 



  





**As an SEO Product Manager, you are expected to:** 



* Manage one product within your vertical and be the expert
* Always be on top of performance, looking at the KPIs for your products and deriving actions from it
* Constantly focus on business, market (iGaming,) and user insights (qualitative and quantitative) to feed the strategy & backlogs
* Prioritize and plan upcoming work that aligns with the current roadmap
* Work in a cross-functional team (SEO, Content, CRO, UX, Dev, Sale,s etc) with the main focus on delivering user and business value and managing day-to-day operations
* Focus on early learning and validation by having a data-driven mindset when solving business/user problems & opportunities
* Eager to identify and generate new sales opportunities
* Coordinate with key stakeholders throughout the initiatives
* Proficient in the different aspects of SEO (on-page, off-page, technical)
* Attention to detail
* Follow up on the initiatives with data to be able to understand the potential value
* Work in an iterative and agile/lean product development mindset throughout the whole user journey (acquisition, activation, revenue & retention)



**Success in this role means** 



* Thrive in a dynamic environment (SEO, iGaming) with a high bar to constantly do the right thing
* Love the full spectrum of agile and lean product management
* Be a team player and collaborator who loves to be part of cross-functional teams
* Become successful through a product-led and data-driven mindset with a focus on understanding our users and early learnings and insights



  





**Job requirements:** 



* Proficient experience in agile and lean product management
* Critical thinking skills and problem-solving skills
* Data-driven experience with analytical tools such as PowerBI, Looker, GA4, Hotjar
* Capable of using SEO tools such as SEMrush, Ahrefs, Search Console
* Proficient WordPress knowledge
* Result-driven leader with excellent communication skills
* Working proficiency in English, both verbal and written
* Preferably experience and understanding from experimentation (CRO)
* Preferably experience within affiliation and iGaming

title: Senior iOS Engineer
description:
**YOUR MISSION AT VOI**
 As a Senior IOS Engineer You’re a Part Of a Cross Functional Team With Highly Skilled Backend Engineers, Mobile Engineers, UX Designers And Product Professionals. The Team Owns Development And Delivery Of Products And Features Built On The IOS Rider App Used By Over a Million Of End Users. You Will Be a Part Of Our IOS Chapter And Take Part In Developing What Mobile Development Is At Voi. Your Responsibility Is Also To Build Features That Engage And Empower Our Users And Drive The App Experience Forward. This Will Include
   

  

* Designing, developing and maintaining features in large cross-team iOS applications
* Analysing business requirements and developing high-performance, innovative and useful mobile software solutions for iOS
* Keeping up to date with the latest fast changing trends in iOS development.
* Testing cutting-edge techniques and tools to level up mobile development at Voi
* Ensuring high level of architecture, quality, usability and maintainability of the components and code
* Participating in all aspects of product development from detailed programming to high-level system design


**What You Need To Embark**
 Except having an interest in staying up to date on iOS development, we believe the right person has:
   

  

* 3+ years of experience as a Senior Engineer developing native iOS applications built on Swift and Xcode
* Ability to communicate technical ideas clearly and effectively
* Experience writing well-structured, testable, reliable, efficient and easily maintainable code
* Preferably worked with GPS/Map based iOS applications with complex UI’s.
* Experience working collaboratively with other engineers, Product Managers and Designers to build a great app and experience


**WHY VOI?**
 Working At Voi Is More Than Just a Job; Our People Promise Includes a Personal Voiage Where You Will Grow As a Professional And Be a Part Of a Team And Culture That Builds Something Meaningful For Society. In Addition To This You’ll Have The Opportunity To
   

  

* Join Europes #1 micromobility company
* Get “skin in the game” through our employee options program and be a part of building a world class organisation
* Work with inspiring, motivated and fun colleagues towards a common goal
* Join the micromobility-revolution and be a part of creating sustainable cities made for living, free from noise and pollution


 Since 2018,
 **Voi** 
 has been on a mission to create safe, sustainable and reliable micromobility for everyone. Today we are the leading shared micromobility operator in Europe, with HQ in Stockholm (Sweden), operating 100,000+ vehicles in 100+ towns and cities across 12 countries, serving 7+ million riders with over 300+ MILLION rides to date, and we have no intention of stopping here! We believe that micromobility will play a central role in changing how people move in our towns and cities in the future and want to ensure that the micromobility transformation happens the right way - through real innovative technology, partnership and transparent dialogue with towns, cities and governments, and by adapting our products to the local needs. In addition to improving quality of life in cities around the world, we are contributing to the solution for climate change by making sustainable transportation options more widely available and promoting renewable energy use and circularity along our supply chain.
   

  

**Diversity Matters**
 As a Voiager, we offer you a friendly, collaborative and fast-paced workplace where you can bring your whole self to work, regardless of gender, age, ethnicity, religion, disability or sexual orientation - and welcome applications from whoever you are, including veterans, those actively serving as a Reservist and their partners. What is most important to us is how you treat others and what skills and value you bring to our team. We believe that having a wide diversity of people with different backgrounds and perspectives within Voi is essential to our success in delivering the best user experience to our equally diverse user base. With employees from over 50 nationalities working within Voi, we believe we have made good progress but know we can still do more - therefore we discourage any photos, personal letters, or disclosure of any information that concerns other information than your professional experience.

title: IT Solution Architect
description:
From humble beginnings in the early 1990s, we have become connectivity partner of choice to the world’s largest content providers, operators and enterprises. In the past, our network laid the very foundations of the Internet revolution and today it’s enabling digitalization throughout business and society.
   

  

 Arelion, formerly Telia Carrier, is owned by Polhem Infra, a Swedish investment company backed by some of the largest Swedish public pension funds. We started building our network in 1993, when our Autonomous System, AS1299, was allocated, and we’ve grown organically ever since. Our network now stretches 70,000 kms across Europe, North America and Asia and lets you connect directly to more than 2,300 wholesale customers in more than 125 countries. With more than 450 local access partners around the world, we are the backbone of your business, wherever you are.
   

  

*Arelion provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by relevant local laws.*
 If you haven’t heard of us, we are still pretty sure you are using our network every day. Arelion owns and operates one of the most extensive fibre backbones of the world. We have operated our fibre/DWDM and IP nodes across the globe for 30 years, but only the last 3 years as Arelion.
   

  

 Even if we are a classical Telecommunications company, IT is a top priority for us. We are currently moving into new systems at the speed of light, and working hard to let our customers self-serve, connect via APIs and or view their data in different ways in our customer portal.
   

  

 You will belong to a small team with other IT Solution Architects, with a responsibility for different areas, like a system, or a business area. Most of the team is situated in Solna in Stockholm, but the company is world-wide with offices and colleagues in many locations in the world.
   

  

 You will be the bridge between the business stakeholders, our end customers and the developers, translating the requirements into robust IT solutions, making sure they are compliant with agreed architecture and consistent with similar solutions, specifying the development items (often including integrations), coordinating the work between development teams (inhouse and outsourced), and making sure that the end solution is accepted by the business and that the change is landing well with the business or with customers.
   

  

**The Main Responsibilities And Tasks Are**
* Lead workshops and requirements gathering with the business stakeholders.
* Design the solution, in new or existing systems. If a new system is needed, you will find and propose potential solutions to a steering group or business stakeholders.
* Refine requirements into development items and change requests for external vendors and/or internal development teams, including frontend developers, data engineers, integration platform or backend developers etc.
* Assist and follow up vendors and help developers during development and verify that the solution is being built according to plan during development phase.
* Make sure that the end-to-end process for the solution is received and working well with the business users
* Communicate changes to business stakeholders and customers.
* Maintain a roadmap with priority and input from the business product owner.


**We will offer you**
* A stable employer with 500 employees over the world, in 17 different offices. 160 employees are located in Sweden.
* A thriving work environment with a lot of skilled and helpful colleagues.
* A hybrid workplace where you can optimize work life with other aspects of life. Our modern office is very close to the Solna train (“pendeltåg”) station and Mall of Scandinavia. We have showers and a safe cycle storage room if you come by bike.
* Nice benefits like yearly bonus, lunch card and wellness allowance etc.
* An employer to be proud of. From humble beginnings in the 1990s, we have become connectivity partner of choice to the world’s largest content providers, operators and enterprises. In the past, our network laid the very foundations of the Internet revolution and today it’s enabling digitalization throughout business and society.
* A place to work where you can be customer centric and proud of what you do. We are a recognized world leader for customer service and a multiple award winner of best UX, best customer care and best customer service awards. Our focus on continuous improvement is relentless.


**We Believe That You Have**
* A curious mind and a strong own drive and self-leadership.
* Great social skills but you can work independently. You are approachable and service-minded to customers and colleagues.
* A degree in computer science or other relevant background.
* Proven solution architecture experience or a background as a developer with a mix of technical leadership experience.
* Integration skills – you know your REST APIs and swagger definitions.
* Requirement specification skills.
* A good understanding of networks and the software & hardware required to power the network.
* Excellent communication skills in English, both written and spoken.
* A structured way to work, where you document what is necessary before, during and after a project.
* Knowledge in IT security and GDPR

title: Quality Assurance Tester- Remote
description:
WestLink is a dynamic software development agency dedicated to delivering high-quality solutions for our clients. We focus on creating exceptional user experiences through innovative software while maintaining efficient and agile workflows. Join our talented team and be part of a collaborative environment where your contributions will shape the future of software quality.

**Job Summary:**

As a **Quality Assurance (QA) Tester** at WestLink, you will be responsible for ensuring the quality, reliability, and performance of our software products. The ideal candidate will have experience in both manual and automated testing, playing a critical role in ensuring that our applications meet high standards. You’ll collaborate with cross-functional teams, perform thorough testing, and ensure the products we deliver are defect-free and perform optimally.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **Testing & Quality Assurance:**
* Design and execute manual test plans, cases, and scripts to validate web, mobile (iOS, Android), and API applications.
* Conduct functional, regression, integration, and performance testing to ensure the reliability of the products.
* Identify, document, and track software defects, providing clear feedback to development teams for resolution.
* Participate in cross-team collaboration to ensure alignment on quality goals and testing strategies throughout the software development lifecycle (SDLC).
* **Automation & Tooling:**
* Develop automated test scripts and assist in integrating them into CI/CD pipelines to enhance efficiency and reliability.
* Assist in optimizing and expanding automated test coverage for key application areas.
* Explore and implement third-party testing tools to enhance product quality.
* **Collaboration & Reporting:**
* Work closely with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to ensure clear communication of testing objectives and outcomes.
* Participate in sprint planning and daily standups to share progress, highlight challenges, and collaborate on solutions.
* Generate detailed test reports and provide feedback to teams to ensure prompt issue resolution and continued improvement.
* **Process Improvement:**
* Identify opportunities for improving testing processes, methodologies, and automation strategies.
* Stay current with industry best practices in software testing and apply them to improve testing workflows.

**Required Skills & Qualifications:**

* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
* Strong problem-solving skills, with the ability to diagnose issues and work through solutions.
* Experience with testing web, mobile, and API applications.
* Familiarity with Agile methodologies and SDLC.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

* Strong experience in automation testing with tools such as: REST Assured, Protractor, Selenium, jMeter or Load Runner
* Strong knowledge of UI and API test automation frameworks
* Certifications in software testing ( ISTQB, CSTE )
* Proficiency in using test management and bug tracking tools ( JIRA, TestRail )

**Benefits:**

* Competitive salary
* Opportunities for professional development and training.
* Flexible work environment with remote options.
* Paid time off and holiday benefits.

Job Types: Full-time, Contract

Work Location: Remote

title: IT Support Specialist at Lindt & Sprüngli
description:
Do you want a job that truly tastes like success? At Lindt & Sprüngli, you’ll not only work for one of the world’s most beloved brands - but also play a key role in shaping a modern and efficient IT environment as we continue our Nordic growth journey.


We are now looking for an IT Support Specialist to join our new IT team. Here, you’ll get the chance to make an impact, collaborate with people from around the globe, and support our amazing colleagues – all while surrounded by the world’s finest chocolate.


### **About the Role – IT that Makes a Difference**

As an IT Support Specialist, you’ll be our everyday hero in IT. You will work closely with our Nordic teams and global experts to deliver first-class support, develop efficient processes, and contribute to a stable and innovative IT environment. The role is varied, crucial, and full of opportunities for someone who loves both technology and people.


**Your main responsibilities will include:**

* Providing user support with mainly 1st, but also 2nd line assistance for IT-systems such as SAP, Salsify, POS, O365, etc.
* Working on system integration and technical interfaces
* Identifying and driving improvements in business processes and automation
* Documenting and conduct user training – raising the digital competency throughout the organization
* Participating in exciting IT projects and collaborating with both internal and external partners

##### **Your Profile – Genuine Interest in Technology and a drive for Development**

**We believe you have:**

* Experience in IT support within a business-driven environment
* Familiarity with working in SAP and documentation
* Basic coding skills (e.g., SQL, JavaScript, or Python)
* A genuine interest in business processes and how IT can improve them
* A bachelor's degree in Information Technology / Computer Science / Business Information systems / Software Engineering / Management Information systems / or related field.

**And that you are:**

* A team player with positive energy
* Skilled in communication, both verbal and written
* Curious with a problem-solving mindset
* Meticulous, structured, and passionate about making things run smoothly

**It’s a plus if you have:**

* Knowledge of SAP IBP, BTP, Lobster-Data, or Salsify
* Experience with Atlassian tools (Jira, Confluence) and ServiceNow
* Advanced programming skills

Don’t meet every single requirement? We believe in potential and growth — if you're excited about this role, we encourage you to apply!


**Why Lindt & Sprüngli is Right for You:**

Join us and let us embark together on a rewarding journey with Lindt Nordic, where your career can flourish through ample opportunities for professional development. You'll collaborate with a diverse and international team, gaining global perspectives while contributing to meaningful sustainability initiatives. We offer a competitive salary and benefits package that reflects the premium nature of our brand, along with flexible working arrangements to help you balance your lifestyle. At Lindt Nordic, we value excellence and innovation in everything we do. If you're excited about this opportunity and can see yourself thriving in our culture of quality and innovation — we’d love to hear from you.


### **About Lindt & Sprüngli**

Lindt has delighted chocolate lovers all over the world since 1845. During the 180 years of Lindt & Sprüngli’s existence, the company has produced chocolate and chocolate related products. Nothing else. Generations of thrilled, imaginative, enthusiastic and inventive employees have built the company to what it is today: the world’s leading producer of premium chocolate. Within the last 20 years, Lindt has succeeded reshaping the chocolate market in the Nordics. From having been a niche player, Lindt has quickly grown into the 2nd biggest supplier in the chocolate tablets & pralines market in Sweden and is one of the fastest growing chocolate companies in the rest of the region. By far, we consider Lindt to be the most shining name within the premium chocolate category.  

  

Lindt’s key brands EXCELLENCE and LINDOR have quickly reached stronghold status in their field of business and are appreciated by millions of Swedes and Scandinavians on a regular basis. For more information; www.lindt.se


**Application**

Lindt & Sprüngli Nordic AB is working in partnership with Awexia Executive Search for this recruitment. For questions about the position, contact the responsible recruitment consultants:


* Henrik Dellgren – henrik.dellgren@awexia.com; +46 73 916 61 80
* Ida Edlund – ida.edlund@awexia.com; +46 73 212 23 59

Send your application as soon as possible – selections are made on an ongoing basis.


We look forward to receiving your application!

title: Senior IT Support Specialist at Lindt & Sprüngli
description:
Do you want a job that truly tastes like success? Since 1845, Lindt has enriched the world with first-class chocolate – and we have no plans to slow down. Through passion, innovation, and a focus on quality, we've grown to become a global leader in premium chocolate. Here in the Nordics, we are currently Sweden's second largest supplier of chocolate bars and pralines, and one of the fastest-growing chocolate companies in the entire region.


But behind every chocolate experience is an IT-landscape that must meet the same high standards. Do you want to help shape it?


### **About the role – IT that makes a difference**

We are looking for a Senior IT Support Specialist who wants to join our newly established IT team in Solna. This is a strategically important role – you will be the hub of our Nordic IT support and a driving force in our efforts to create a seamless, secure, and modern IT environment.


You will work closely with both our global headquarters and external experts, take ownership of 1st line and 2nd line support, and be a key player in our IT projects. Your manager will be the Head of IT.


**Your main responsibilities:**

* Business process development: Identify improvement opportunities, gather requirements, and drive the implementation of smart, user-friendly IT solutions in collaboration with internal and external partners.
* System integration: Be the technical contact point for questions about interfaces and connections between systems.
* World-class IT support: Assist our users in succeeding – whether it involves SAP, Salsify, POS systems, O365, or network connections.
* Documentation & training: Structure, document, and train users to maximize the value of our applications.

#### **Your profile**

You are not only experienced – you are curious, solutions-oriented, and ready to take responsibility. You are passionate about combining technology with business improvements, and you thrive when you get to be the link between users, systems, and innovation.


**We believe you have:**

* Solid experience in IT support at a senior level
* Deep knowledge of SAP support (material data, purchasing, inventory, quality, sales, finance, etc.)
* Understanding of business processes within distribution operations
* SQL programming skills
* Experience with SAP, IBP, BTP, Lobster-Data, and Salsify
* A master’s degree in Information Technology / Computer Science / Business Information systems / Software Engineering / Management Information systems / or related field.

**And that you bring:**

* Strong communication skills – both technical and pedagogical
* A collaborative and positive approach to solving problems together with the team
* A Curious, flexible and adaptable mindset to new systems, new changes, and sudden challenges
* A detail-oriented focus with a keen eye for structure

**It’s a plus if you have:**

* Leadership skills in development projects and documentation
* Experience with Atlassian (Jira, Confluence), ServiceNow, or Lobster-Data
* Basic understanding of JavaScript, ABAP, or Python

Don’t meet every single requirement? We believe in potential and growth — if you're excited about this role, we encourage you to apply!

Join us and let us embark together on a rewarding journey with Lindt Nordic, where your career can flourish through ample opportunities for professional development. At Lindt Nordic, we value excellence and innovation in everything we do. If you're excited about this opportunity and can see yourself thriving in our culture of quality and innovation — we’d love to hear from you.


### **About Lindt & Sprüngli**

Lindt has delighted chocolate lovers all over the world since 1845. During the 180 years of Lindt & Sprüngli’s existence, the company has produced chocolate and chocolate related products. Nothing else. Generations of thrilled, imaginative, enthusiastic and inventive employees have built the company to what it is today: the world’s leading producer of premium chocolate. Within the last 20 years, Lindt has succeeded reshaping the chocolate market in the Nordics. From having been a niche player, Lindt has quickly grown into the 2nd biggest supplier in the chocolate tablets & pralines market in Sweden and is one of the fastest growing chocolate companies in the rest of the region. By far, we consider Lindt to be the most shining name within the premium chocolate category.


Lindt’s key brands EXCELLENCE and LINDOR have quickly reached stronghold status in their field of business and are appreciated by millions of Swedes and Scandinavians on a regular basis. For more information; www.lindt.se

title: Senior Backend Engineer
description:
**Join our global force of 500+ innovators, blending the latest in tech with the greatest in soundtracking, from our Stockholm HQ to offices in London, New York, Los Angeles, Berlin, Oslo, and Seoul. We’re an industry leader with a startup mentality. We take what we do seriously, but we don’t take ourselves too seriously. Creating and collaborating to transform the sound of streaming, content, and culture. Come join us— and let the world feel your work.**

 **The role**

  

Imagine being at the heart of the music that fuels creativity worldwide. As a Senior Software Engineer in our Sound Platform team (SPLAT), you'll be instrumental in building and maintaining the building blocks that empower all other product teams at Epidemic Sound. We're the engine that ensures everyone has seamless access to the right music and sound effects, enriched with accurate and comprehensive metadata.


Think of us as the central sound library, and you'll make it accessible, organized, and efficient, directly impacting how our teams integrate sound into innovative products for thousands of users. This is a unique opportunity to shape a foundational platform with broad impact.


Supportive team, collaborative problem-solving (pair/mob programming!), and hack weeks await. Passionate about sound and building? Find your rhythm with us.

**What you'll be doing:**

  

* Champion best practices in system design, development, deployment, reliability, and security for our critical sound infrastructure.
* Design, develop, and maintain scalable backend services on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) to power our internal sound library and metadata management.
* Collaborate closely with other product teams to ensure seamless integration of our sound platform into their products and workflows.
* Partner with product managers, engineers and other stakeholders to understand their needs and translate them into robust technical solutions.
* Contribute to the evolution of our roadmap, bringing your expertise to shape the future of our sound platform.
* Clearly articulate technical concepts, challenges, and solutions to both technical and non-technical audiences.

 **We're building the future of our sound platform using modern technologies, including:**

  

* Golang (our primary backend language)
* Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
* Kubernetes and Docker for containerization and orchestration
* GitHub and GitHub Actions for seamless version control and CI/CD
* Grafana for insightful monitoring and observability
* Event-driven architecture and microservices to ensure scalability and resilience

 **What we're looking for:**

  

* 5+ years of experience in building and operating backend systems at scale.
* A strong understanding of distributed systems and sound architectural principles.
* Solid experience in at least one backend language (we primarily use Go but experience with Java, Kotlin, Python works)
* Experience working with cloud environments.
* Familiarity with modern CI/CD pipelines and automation.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively across teams.

 **How you'll thrive in SPLAT:**


You're naturally curious and proactive, always looking for ways to improve and innovate. You enjoy diving deep into complex problems and take pride in delivering reliable and high-quality solutions. You're someone who embraces change and sees it as an opportunity to learn and grow. Specifically, you:

  

* Adapt to evolving needs and technologies with enthusiasm.
* Share your knowledge and insights openly with your teammates.
* Believe in the power of teamwork and transparent communication.
* Think strategically about the long-term impact of your work while delivering value iteratively.

  

Ready to shape the sound that moves the world? Join SPLAT and make some noise!

 **Equal opportunity employer**


We believe that bringing people together from different backgrounds, experiences and perspectives makes for a healthy workplace, a more successful business and a better world. We value diversity and encourage everyone to come and soundtrack the world with us.

 **Application**


Ready to make the world feel your work? Apply now by clicking the link below! We embrace a hybrid model but love collaborating in person, so we spend the majority of our time in the office.

title: Software Engineer
description:
**Software Engineer**


**Description**


**About Textron GSE**


Textron Ground Support Equipment, a division of Textron Specialized Vehicles Inc. is a leading global manufacturer of ground support equipment. Textron GSE markets products under the Safeaero, TUG, Douglas, and Premier brands. Textron GSE offers a full product line-up from conventional and towbarless pushbacks, baggage tractors, tow tractors, belt loaders, one-man and two-man deicers, ground power units, air starts, and air conditioning units. For more information, visit www.TextronGSE.com . **About Textron Specialized Vehicles**


Textron Specialized Vehicles Inc. is a leading global manufacturer of golf cars, utility and personal transportation vehicles, and ground support equipment. Textron Specialized Vehicles markets products under a variety of brands, including E-Z-GO®, Cushman®, TUG™ and Douglas™ brands. Its vehicles are found in environments ranging from golf courses to factories, airports to planned communities, and theme parks to hunting preserves. **Opportunity**

title: Kontinuitet och beredskapssamordnare
description:
Vi får samhället att fungera för människor på väg, på spår, i luften och på sjön. Därför behöver vi den bästa kompetensen. Vårt uppdrag är viktigt och har betydelse i vardagen – både för privatpersoner och företag. Hos oss tar vi ansvar, behandlar alla på ett bra sätt och har respekt för olikheter. Som medarbetare bidrar du till en hållbar framtid.

**Om jobbet**
-------------


På enhet It-säkerhet vill vi vara något extra. Vi vill ständigt förbättra, både organisation och oss själva. Vi är nyfikna och vill alltid lära oss mer. Vi tror på transparens och öppenhet och inser värdet av olika åsikter, vilket är extra viktigt när frågorna vi arbetar med är komplexa och till sin natur saknar givna svar. Vårt arbete är ibland utmanande, därför stödjer vi varandra i vått och torrt. Vi samarbetar, på riktigt.


Vi söker dig med stort engagemang som vill vara en del av vår fortsatta utveckling av beredskapen inom myndigheten. Du kommer vara en viktig del i att myndigheten når nästa nivå när det gäller vårt stora långsiktiga förändrings- och utvecklingsarbete. Myndigheten har nyligen etablerat egen drift, och det pågår utveckling av nytt vägtrafikregister samt långsiktiga säkerhetshöjande åtgärder. Så här finns många och utvecklande utmaningar som väntar på dig!


Du kommer att arbeta inom områdena kontinuitet och beredskap inom IT, där fokus är att tillse att IT-avdelningen arbetar samordnat och enhetligt gällande beredskapsfrågor, krishantering och kontinuitetshantering. Funktionen ansvarar för att avdelningens systematiska säkerhetsarbete inom kontinuitet- och beredskap samordnas och utvecklas. Detta sker genom utbildning, stöd i det dagliga arbetet för sektioner och enheter, analyser samt framtagande av krav mm.

**Hos oss är du viktig**
------------------------


Gillar du att jobba tillsammans med andra och vill du utvecklas i din yrkesroll? Hos oss kan du förvänta dig karriärsutveckling, ett förtroendefullt chefs- och medarbetarskap och ett hållbart arbetsliv. Vi är en trygg arbetsgivare som månar om din hälsa med tid för friskvård på arbetstid, flexibla arbetstider, väl tilltaget antal semesterdagar och lediga klämdagar.


Läs mer om hur det är att jobba på Transportstyrelsen

**Du kommer att**
-----------------

* analysera och utveckla avdelningens krisledning inför fredstida kriser och höjd beredskap
* agera stabschef i avdelningens krisledning
* ta fram kravställning för kontinuitets och beredskapsområdet
* ge stöd i kontinuitetshantering till avdelningens verksamheter och sektioner
* samordna och utveckla risk och sårbarhetsanalysarbetet inom avdelningen
* planera och genomföra utbildningsinsatser och övningsverksamhet för vår personal kopplat till ditt område
* samordna planering för särskilda händelser inom avdelningen
* representera avdelning IT i samverkansforum och arbetsgrupper för myndigheten inom dina områden
* samverka med myndighetens alla verksamheter och vid behov andra myndigheter eller organisationer
* upprätta och förvalta styrande dokument inom ditt område
* granska och handlägga interna och externa remisser inom området
* ta fram lägesbilder och ansvara för rapportering.

**Du måste ha**
---------------

* för uppdraget relevant eftergymnasial utbildning inom samhällsvetenskap, civil beredskap eller annat område som arbetsgivaren bedömer likvärdigt eller motsvarande kunskap förvärvad på annat sätt
* dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete med inriktning på kris- och beredskapsområdet
* goda kunskaper om svensk totalförsvarsplanering och säkerhetsskyddslagstiftningen
* god förmåga att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift på svenska.

**Det är meriterande om du också har**
--------------------------------------

* minst 2 års högskole- eller universitetsutbildning med it-inriktning, eller motsvarande kunskap förvärvad på annat sätt
* utbildning inom ett eller flera områden såsom stabstjänst, säkerhetsskydd, kontinuitet, högre kurs i totalförsvar (HK 1)
* erfarenhet av arbete med risk och sårbarhetsanalyser
* erfarenhet av beredskapsplanering inom offentlig verksamhet
* erfarenhet av kontinuitetsarbete inom it-området
* erfarenhet som stabschef inom krisledning
* erfarenhet att jobba med ramverk och standarder så som ISO 27002, ISO 22034-2023, NIS2.

**Vi vill att du**
------------------

* tar ansvar för din arbetsuppgift, strukturerar själv ditt angreppssätt och driver dina processer vidare
* har ett förhållningssätt som präglas av samarbetsförmåga och balanserad dialog med olika intressenter
* är lyhörd, har en god kommunikativ förmåga
* är flexibel, prestigelös och gärna delar med dig av kunskaper och erfarenheter
* är mål- och lösningsorienterad och är öppen för förändringar.


Stor vikt läggs vid personlig lämplighet.

**Mer information**
-------------------


Anställningen är tillsvidare med placering i Örebro. Tillsättning enligt överenskommelse. Vi tillämpar normalt provanställning. Som medarbetare hos oss finns möjlighet att arbeta på distans upp till tre dagar i veckan. Det är verksamhetens behov och karaktären på arbetsuppgifterna som avgör om och i vilken utsträckning det är möjligt. En anställning hos oss kan innebära placering i säkerhetsklass. En säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) kan därför komma att genomföras. För en del av våra arbetsuppgifter i säkerhetsklass krävs svenskt medborgarskap.


Vid frågor är du välkommen att kontakta sektionschef Hanna Gullberg, hanna.gullberg@transportstyrelsen.se ST, Axel Frick och Saco-S, Benedicte Johansson nås via vår växel på 0771-503 503.


Vi vill inte att annonsörer och bemanningsföretag kontaktar oss.

**Ansök**
---------


Ansök via vår webbplats och bifoga ett komplett CV samt ett personligt brev märkt med referensnummer TSG 2025-5815. Vi behöver din ansökan senast den 23 juni 2025. Har du skyddade personuppgifter, ska du skicka in din ansökan per post, kontakta rekryterande chef för information om hur du går tillväga. I dina ansökningshandlingar behöver du beskriva på vilket sätt du uppfyller efterfrågade kvalifikationer och meriter kopplat till aktuell rekrytering. Om du går vidare i anställningsprocessen ska alltid utbildnings-/examensbevis samt tjänstgöringsintyg som styrker de kunskaper och erfarenheter som är relevanta för tjänsten uppvisas.


Välkommen att bli vår nya kollega!

title: Juniora konsulter | Technology Risk | Göteborg
description:
Vill du jobba på ett av Sveriges mest attraktiva företag som erbjuder en inkluderande kultur och personlig utveckling? Är du intresserad av att arbeta i en teamorienterad organisation där du får stöd och vägledning från erfarna kollegor? Starta din karriär som junior konsult inom vår Technology risk avdelning på EY!  

  

Vi söker nu juniora konsulter till vårt kontor i Göteborg med start i augusti 2025 och riktar oss mot dig som är nyutexaminerad inom områdena, ekonomi, IT-säkerhet, systemvetenskap, ingenjör eller motsvarande från universitet eller högskola.

 **Din roll som konsult hos oss**

  

Är du redo att ta dig an utmaningen att hjälpa organisationer att navigera genom det ständigt föränderliga landskapet av teknologiska risker? Vi söker nu drivna, analytiska och detaljorienterade konsulter som kan ansluta sig till vårt dynamiska team inom Technology Risk. Hos oss kommer du att arbeta med en mångsidig klientportfölj som sträcker sig över både den privata och offentliga sektorn, och du kommer att ha möjlighet att engagera dig i både nationella och internationella projekt.

  

I din roll som konsult kommer du att vara en nyckelspelare i att erbjuda rådgivning inom kritiska områden som IT-internkontroll, IT-revision, IT-styrning och cybersäkerhet. Ditt arbete kommer att innebära att genomföra detaljerade riskanalyser, utvärdera IT-processer och rekommendera förbättringar.

  

Din förmåga att förstå och analysera den senaste tekniska utvecklingen kommer att vara avgörande. Du kommer att ställas inför frågor som: Vilka risker medför ökad automatisering? Hur pålitliga är kontrollerna hos externa molntjänstleverantörer? På vilket sätt kan vi säkerställa att kundens information skyddas när den hanteras av tredje part?

 **Egenskaper för att lyckas i rollen:**

  

* Intresse och förståelse för IT-risker och teknik
* Lyhörd lagspelare med ambitionen att vara högpresterande
* Kommunikativ med god förmåga att arbeta i team
* Nyfiken och entreprenörsdriven
* En fallenhet för att hantera förändring
* Detaljorienterad
* Ansvarstagande och proaktiv

  



**Kvalifikationer för tjänsten:**

  

* Relevant universitetsexamen (exempelvis IT, informationssäkerhet, systemvetenskap, datateknik, civilingenjör, jurist eller civilekonom)
* Hög språklig nivå i tal och skrift, både på svenska och engelska
* Relevant IT-teknisk kompetens (t.ex. hantering av affärssystem, operativsystem, databaser) eller kunskap om IT-risk och informationssäkerhet (t.ex. CoBiT, ITIL, ISO27001 och NIST) är meriterande

  



**Vad EY erbjuder dig**

  

* **Kontinuerligt lärande**: Du utvecklar tankesätt och färdigheter som hjälper dig att navigera in i framtiden.
* **Framgång så som du definierar den**: Vi ger dig verktygen och flexibiliteten, så att du kan göra skillnad på ditt sätt.
* **Transformativt ledarskap**: Vi ger dig insikter, coachning och självförtroende för att bli den ledare som världen behöver.
* **Inkluderande kultur**: Du kommer att accepteras för den du är och få möjlighet att använda din röst för att hjälpa andra att hitta sin.

  



Läs gärna mer om vad EY kan erbjuda dig på Karriärsidan, i sociala medier och på Karriärbloggen.

 **Vill du starta din karriär som konsult hos oss?**

  

Då är du varmt välkommen att söka tjänsten. Skicka in din ansökan senast den 15 juni, ansökningar kommer att gås igenom löpande. Vid frågor om rekryteringsprocessen, kontakta Josefine Hesse på josefine.hesse@se.

 **Ansökningsprocessen består av följande steg:**

  

* Fyll i ansökningsformuläret


* För att din ansökan ska vara giltig behöver du ladda upp ditt CV, personliga brev samt betyg från universitet/högskola. Vi ser gärna att du skickar med intyg från tidigare arbetsgivare med.


3. Om du går vidare till nästa steg bjuder vi in dig till en intervju som innehåller ett case och personlig intervju.


Observera att en bakgrundskontroll kommer att genomföras som en del av rekryteringsprocessen.

  

På EY främjar vi en inkluderande miljö och stöttar våra medarbetares olikheter. Med vårt fokus på mångfald uppmuntrar vi ansökningar från kandidater med olika bakgrunder. Om du är i behov av särskilt stöd eller anpassning under rekryteringsprocessen, vänligen kontakta vårt rekryteringsteam på recruitment@se.

 **EY | Building a better working world**

  

På EY arbetar vi varje dag för att uppfylla vårt syfte "Building a better working world" och skapa långsiktigt värde för våra kunder, medarbetare och samhället i stort.

  

Med stöd av data och teknik bygger vi förtroende på finansmarknader och hjälper våra kunder att växa och utvecklas.

  

Vi samarbetar inom våra tjänsteområden revision, redovisning, affärsrådgivning, skatt, strategi och transaktioner, så att vi kan ställa bättre frågor för att hitta nya svar på de komplexa utmaningar som världen står inför i dag.
company_description: At EY, we are committed to building a better working world.

title: Project Lead
description:
We are seeking a highly experienced and technically proficient Project Lead to oversee the design, development, and delivery of enterprise-grade solutions using Microsoft 365, SharePoint On-Premises, SharePoint Framework (SPFx), Azure services, and related technologies. The ideal candidate will have over 10+ years of experience in M365 development, strong leadership capabilities, and a proven track record of managing cross-functional teams in Agile environments.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

Lead end-to-end project delivery for Microsoft 365 and Azure-based solutions.
  
Architect and implement solutions using Power Automate, Power Apps, SharePoint Online, and SPFx.
  
Design and develop SPFx web parts, extensions, application customizers, and field customizers.
  
Manage SharePoint migrations (on-premises & SharePoint Online).
  
Develop and maintain applications using Azure Logic Apps, Runbooks, Web jobs, Azure Functions, and .NET/C#.
  
Create and maintain React-based UI components for enterprise applications.
  
Write and manage PowerShell scripts for automation and system management.
  
Utilize PNPjs for SharePoint development and customization.
  
Perform SQL development and database management tasks.
  
Collaborate with business stakeholders, developers, and QA teams to ensure timely and high-quality delivery.
  
Apply Agile methodologies and adhere to ITIL processes for service management.
  
Use tools like Jira and Ivanti for project tracking and support.
  
  

**Required Qualifications:**  

10+ years of experience in Microsoft 365 and SharePoint(Online & On-Premises) development.
  
Strong expertise in SPFx, Power Platform, Azure services, and .NET/C#.
  
Proficiency in React, PowerShell, SQL, and PNPjs.
  
Experience leading technical teams and managing enterprise-scale projects.
  
Deep understanding of Agile and ITIL frameworks.
  
Excellent communication, problem-solving, and stakeholder management skills.
  
Experience with DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines.
  
Familiarity with governance and compliance in M365 environments
  
  

**Education:**  

Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related fields.
  
  

**Preferred Certifications:**  

Power Platform/Azure
